inicio.appDesc: To receive special promotions and exclusive announcements!

mapa.descricao: Visualize the Interactive Map of Bandeirantes.Our city is your perfect destination

hoteis.descricao: Find hotels, inns and farms to stay

turismo.descricao: Get to know our main tourist points

restaurantes.descricao: When hunger beats, our food will surprise you!Unforgettable dishes and flavors

album.descricao: Do you still have questions if you should know the city?So go to our photos and be enchanted by the beauty of the city

agenda.descricao: Get to know our calendar of events to not lose any attraction.

topico1.paragrafo1: Until the year 1920, the region was a gross backcountry, inhabited only by the Caingangues tribe Indians.The first to explore this territory was the engineer Carlos Borromei, where his camp raises in an open clearing in the woods on the banks of RibeirÃ£o das Antas.On December 24, 1926, D. Josefina Alves de Lima, owner of a large land of land on Laranjinha farm, when dividing this property, sold to JoÃ£o Manoel dos Santos ten bushels of land, intended for the founding of a village, whoshould be called wintering.
topico1.paragrafo2: On April 12, 1929, the Winter District was created, as an integral part of the municipality of Jacarezinho, being installed on December 8 of the same year.In July 1930, the SÃ£o Paulo - ParanÃ¡ Railway company, inaugurated a railway station, 3 kilometers from the winter heritage, which was called Bandeirantes, and a village near the station, on the groundJuvenal Mesquita.On September 27, 1931, a power of men of goodwill, began a coalition work in favor of the progress of the season and, consequently, came the winter fall, where the notary, the state collector, houses, hotels, were foundCommerce houses, pharmacies, post office, etc.
topico1.paragrafo3: In 1932, the then federal intervener in ParanÃ¡ visited Bandeirantes, noting that the people wanted the creation of the municipality.There was the unification of the two villages: Bandeirantes and Winter.Start the history of Bandeirantes.

topico2.titulo: Bandeirantes: âA place of faith, nature and traditionsâ
topico2.paragrafo1: Located in the Pioneer North of ParanÃ¡, Bandeirantes is distinguished by the fertile land and the people from various parts of Brazil and the world.The municipality has a strong influence of the Paulistas, miners, Italians, Japanese and Portuguese, the primary origin of the economic and tourist vocations of the municipality.
topico2.paragrafo2: The base of the economy in the municipality is the cultivation of thin table grapes, peppers, cucumber, sugar cane and especially soy and corn.Annually, the green corn party moves the local economy.

clima.descricao: Tropical.Summer is long, hot, stuffy and almost covered in sky;Winter is short, pleasant and almost cloudless sky.

renda.descricao: Get to know our calendar of events to not lose any attraction.

eventosAgenda.desc1: On November 14, Bandeirantes turns 87 years old.On this occasion, I want to congratulate the people of Bandeirantes, who are good people, who are warrior, who are honest and hardworking.Our population is solidarity, friend, is human, is struggling and makes no effort to walk together and build the development of our municipality.
eventosAgenda.desc2: Christmas is one of the most important festive dates of Christianity, being celebrated annually on December 25th.Let's have a small party and distribute joy to all audiences.
eventosAgenda.desc3: Mass time with the novena: 16h and 19h30 (Monday to Saturday).Sunday 25: Mass at 6am, 9am, 12h, 4 pm to 7:30 pm.There will also be a blessing from the cars at 15h.

turismo.subtitulo: Place of faith, nature and traditions
